      • getMainViewId

        public int getMainViewId()
        Description copied from class: InputStep
        If this step supports out of focus we need to specfy which view will be touched to pass from focus to out of focus. A touch event listener will be added to that view. Both the out of focus view and the focus view should match to have this working corretly.
        Specified by:
        getMainViewId in class InputStep
        Returns:
        The identifier for the view that will listen for touch events.

      • getRootContentViewId

        public int getRootContentViewId()
        Description copied from class: InputStep
        As the step needs to be dismissed when touching at some area we allow to the developer to identify which area should listen for touch events for dismiss.
        Overrides:
        getRootContentViewId in class InputStep
        Returns:
        The identifier for the view that should listen for touch events to dismiss this step.

        Description copied from class: InputStep

        Specified by:
